definition: lit. the fairy is willing, but King Xiang doesn't dream (idiom)/(said of a woman's unrequited love)
pinyin: shen2 nu:3 you3 xin1 , Xiang1 Wang2 wu2 meng4

definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
to help/to assist/mutual assistance/to rush into or up/to raise or hold up/high/tall/old variant of 欀/chariot horse (old)/change (old)
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream
lit. the falling flowers are yearning for love, but the heartless brook ripples on (idiom)/fig. one side is willing, yet the other one remains indifferent (usually of unrequited love)
pinyin: luo4 hua1 you3 yi4 , liu2 shui3 wu2 qing2

definition: (of a couple) to be harmonious/to be each other's sunshine
hatred caused by love (idiom)/to grow to hate someone because of unrequited love for that person
too rich to be a good match (in marriage) (idiom)
starts well but ends in separation (of marital relations)
misplaced kindness/humble term: I do not deserve your many kindnesses.
to spin a cocoon around oneself (idiom); enmeshed in a trap of one's own devising/hoist by his own petard
lit. stolen scent, pilfered jade (idiom); philandering/secret illicit sex
